title: after i click  lunch the launcher disappear
body:
So after the new update came out, I can't open league anymore. When I click on the application the launcher opens but right after I hit lunch it disappears. I followed the recommendations but none of them worked. On task manager, it shows that the replication is still running in the background process
please help

replies.body: There may have been a lingering error that didn't properly close the client, so nothing happens when you try to re-launch it.  Restart your PC as a first step to get any issues like that out of the way.  If the problem exists then there may be a permissions setting blocking the patcher from opening.  Our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide would be your best bet towards resolving that.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I restart my computer and run it again but it didn't make any change. The permissions guide is not clear, i can't figure out what am i supose to do

Launch it with --no-sandbox parameter. it helped me to bypass black screen and "nothing appearing" issue

I.e. create shortcut of it and open properties, at the end add that parameter so it will look like

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe" --no-sandbox
Unfortunately, it did not work. but now I see the application being open, before that it would just disapear after i would hit lunch
